talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>First up, the stela over here, on the left.
It says:<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. Their secret will be expressed
on six stelae."
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>As for the stela over there, on the right?
It says:<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. An eighth channels and guides
the powers of these seven."
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I doubt you know this, being a Hylian voe,
but we Gerudo have believed in the
heroines for a long, long time.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They are said to have protected and
guided our people in times past.<sp:0:4:0>Unfortunately, I have found little in the
way of documentation about the heroines
themselves.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There are many debates and
disagreements surrounding these
enigmatic figures.<sp:0:4:0>Some argue for revering all seven as a
collective, and others, for worshipping
each one as an individual.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Certain rabble-rousing contrarians even
claim there were not seven but one!
Or eight!<sp:0:4:0>If there is one thing scholars love, it is
arguing with each other.
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>After all your help with my research,
it is the least I owe you.<sp:0:4:0>There are more mysteries waiting for us
down here, I know it.<sp:0:4:0>My scholarly spirit is soaring!
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But these stelae definitely support the
theory of eight.
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Mm, yes, this legend is well-known,
but it had never been verified...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Until I came along, that is! Ahaha!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>An incredible discovery, isn't it? I could
stop here and rightly say that I changed
the face of archaeology.
But if I found the other four stelae,
who knows what else I might learn
about the heroines?
I wonder, too, about this <clr:0000>orb<clr:ffff> that I found
while searching for the stelae. Is it
connected somehow?
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>If I gave a presentation on all this, I'd be the star of
the archaeology society!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I have not been able to find any
stelae besides these two.<sp:0:4:0>Since there's nothing like them on the
surface, the others must be underground
somewhere.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>*sigh* How I wish I could see the text
inscribed on those stelae. Even just
a <clr:0000>picture <clr:ffff>would serve my purposes.
talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Curious. Does this mean that the seven
heroines' powers have changed form,
even now that they are gone?
And what could be meant by "spirits"?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>What if "spirits" refers to orbs like
this one? Sa'oten! <sp:5:1:0>I believe I've made a
breakthrough!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"The seven heroines protect the Gerudo
with the powers of heart, skill, fortitude,
wisdom, flight, mobility, and compassion."
talk0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So the spirits of the seven heroines are
hidden within the Gerudo region?<sp:0:4:0>Confirming that these spirits are not
legend or rumor, but real, is by itself an
enormous breakthrough.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. Their power is housed within
the seven spirits."
talk0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If the seven heroines' powers return,
we can meet the "shrouded eighth"?<sp:0:4:0>But that must mean...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>There really was an eighth heroine? I
don't believe it! This changes everything!
talk0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There are six stelae inscribed with
information about the heroines. I believe
all six are in this shelter.
We still have to find <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004e0075006d005f00450069006700680074004800650072006f005300740061007400750065007300ffff00cd> of them<clr:ffff>.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. Their spirits rest within the
land of the Gerudo."
talk0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>It's possible they were destroyed or altered when
the town was constructed.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:6400>I wish I could see the text inscribed on
those stelae, or even just a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff>.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"The seven heroines who protect the
Gerudo. When their powers return to
them, the shrouded eighth will be known."
talk0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We Gerudo have long believed in the
heroines.<sp:0:4:0>They are said to have protected and
guided our tribe in times past.<sp:0:4:0>Unfortunately, I have found little in the
way of documentation about the heroines
themselves.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There are many debates and
disagreements surrounding these
enigmatic figures.<sp:0:4:0>Some argue for revering all seven as a
collective, and others, for worshipping
each one as an individual.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Certain rabble-rousing contrarians even
claim there were not seven but one! Or
eight!<sp:0:4:0>Nothing animates scholars more than
bickering over each other's ideas.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh.<sp:5:0:0> You must be that voe everyone is
talking about.<sp:0:4:0>Say...<sp:5:0:0> Are Hylian voe interested
in archaeology?<sp:0:4:0>Would it surprise you to learn that I'm an
archaeologist myself? After much work,
I have finally deciphered these stelae.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Do you want to hear what's written on
them? <sp:5:0:0>You do, don't you?
talk0059:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>...Maybe I should investigate the western area one
more time... But whenever I'm there, I end up
spending all my time at the canteen...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm curious about the text inscribed on
the stelae.<sp:5:0:0> Did you perhaps find any?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>To learn more about the heroines, I need
to find <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004e0075006d005f00450069006700680074004800650072006f005300740061007400750065007300ffff00cd> more <sp:c9:6:1c:0a007300740065006c0061000c007300740065006c00610065000000><clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I'm sure all of the stelae are in the shelter
somewhere, but no matter where I look,
I can't find them.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>To learn the truth about the heroines,
I need to find the other <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:28004e0075006d005f00450069006700680074004800650072006f005300740061007400750065007300ffff00cd> <sp:c9:6:1c:0a007300740065006c0065000c007300740065006c00610065000000><clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The shelter isn't so big, and yet I still
can't find them anywhere...
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We did it! We know what all of the
stelae say!<sp:0:4:0>Now to put it all together.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> So Hylian voe are interested in
archaeology after all?<sp:0:4:0>Do you want me to tell you what is written
here? You do, don't you?
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>The eighth of them connects the other
seven powersâ€”<sp:5:0:0>heart, skill, fortitude,
wisdom, flight, mobility, and compassion.
We have to return the seven heroines'
spirits to them to meet this eighth. Hm.<sp:0:4:0>And those spirits are all hidden within the
Gerudo region.<sp:5:1:0> That should about sum it
up, right?
talk0006:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>That passage leading to the northern ruins...<sp:5:0:0>
I haven't checked there, have I? Hmm.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It occurs to me that there were similar
drawings on the stelae too.
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What? You found another stela?<sp:5:0:0>
Show me!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am curious about what might be written
on the stelae. <sp:5:0:0>You don't have more to
show me, do you?
talk0048:
I think this orb must be one of the spirits
that houses the seven heroines' powers.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_00>Oh... You don't appear to have any new
pictures.
talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know, deep inside the <clr:0000>eastern area<clr:ffff> of
the shelter, there is a place with statues
of the seven heroines.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Those statues... I remember them looking
as if they could hold something.<sp:0:4:0>Maybe we should try placing the <clr:0000>orbs <clr:ffff>in
their arms.<sp:0:4:0>But to do that, we'll have to recover the
other six <clr:0000>orbs<clr:ffff>, wherever they are...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Ehehe! The joys of archaeology! As soon
as you solve one mystery, another
emerges to take its place!
But I'm not deterred! I'll get to the bottom
of each and every one!<sp:0:4:0>And you? Without you, I could not have
deciphered the stelae. I hope you'll help
me uncover the truth of the heroines.
You should keep this orb. You're free to
use it whenever you want.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>And take this too.
talk0032: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>What does this one say? Let's see...
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks to you, only <clr:0000>one stela <clr:ffff>remains
before we learn the truth about
the heroines!
Tell me if you find it. I would even be
satisfied with a <clr:0000>picture <clr:ffff>like you got of
the other ones.
talk0035:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>...Maybe I should look around the southern area one
more time. The soldiers are so on edge though...
I wouldn't want to get in their way.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0036: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Of course! I'm happy to repeat myself!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>What? You're joking.<sp:0:4:0>No one in this town cares about
archaeology. Doesn't anyone want to hear
about my findings?
talk0061:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now that the canteen and its customers have
moved out of the western area, maybe I should
investigate around there one more time...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0021: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>What? You found a stela?<sp:5:0:0> Show me!
talk0063:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now that the soldiers are gone, maybe I should
try and search the southern area...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was in the middle of studying that.<sp:0:4:0>It may be an object of vast historical
significance. Until I <clr:0000>unlock its mysteries<clr:ffff>,
whatever they are,
I don't want anyone to touch it!
talk0064:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'd like to check the room where the "Voe and You"
class is held.<sp:5:0:0> But with students there all afternoon
and night, it won't be easy to sneak in...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If only I had a device that makes pictures
of things, like the one that researcher at
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing <clr:ffff>invented.
